popularityCurve.label: we need to hold criminals accountable and that means we need jail bed space

clusterList.phrase: we need to hold criminals accountable and that means we need jail bed space
instead of planning to build three new titan jails to house an extra 10 000 prisoners by 2012 we should be planning on closing prisons
investing more heavily in community-based punishments
we're not only seeing a diversification of victims but also increased diversification of offenders
so the number of places where sex offenders are able to live has been reduced to very small areas
